title: Bella Thorne Drama From 'Pretty Little Liars' Boss Gets ABC Family Pilot Order
text:
Bella Thorne Drama From 'Pretty Littl... Bella Thorne Drama From 'Pretty Little Liars' Boss Gets ABC Family Pilot Order Next Story Prev Story 5 hrs ago Read more: Hollywood Reporter 
King and Rebecca Serle will pen the pilot. King will exec produce alongside Dan Farah and Miguel Arteta , the latter of whom will also direct.   Hollywood Reporter.
